story:
Let me turn this resume into a story:

Meet a bilingual professional who's passionate about digital media and technology. Their journey began as a Sales Associate at a retail store, where they mastered the art of understanding customer needs and providing excellent service. While maintaining this role, they took on a position as a Project Engineer Assistant, getting their hands dirty with construction observation and administrative duties.

Their career took an interesting turn when they landed a position as a Marketing Assistant. Here, they dove into the world of product launches, participated in customer briefings, and got their first taste of social media marketing. They even gained valuable insight into the financial side of business operations.

Currently, they're pursuing their true passion as a Digital Media Intern while completing their Bachelor's degree in Digital Media Communications at Florida International University. In this role, they've been exploring the cutting-edge world of virtual reality, working with technologies like Oculus Rift and HTC Vive in FIU's Virtual Reality Lab. They've had the opportunity to produce 360-degree video content and have even published an article about an interdisciplinary play focusing on sea level rise for FIU's Inspicio Magazine.

With a solid 3.2 GPA and proficiency in both Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Premiere, they're equipped with both technical skills and practical experience. Their ability to communicate fluently in both English and Spanish makes them particularly valuable in today's diverse workplace. They're now seeking an internship or co-op position where they can continue to grow while putting their education and enthusiasm to work in a professional environment.

This is the story of someone who has steadily built their expertise from customer service to marketing, and finally to their true calling in digital media and virtual reality technology.
